content:
Name Crit Effect Type
Tiring Blow The target is fatigued. Bludgeoning
Leg Wound The target takes a -5-foot status penalty to its land Speed until healed. Piercing
Spun Around The target is flat-footed until the end of its next turn. Slashing
Time Vortex If this is a spell, normal damage and the target vanished and reappears [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} later. The target can use no actions, and any effects it has with durations do not pass while it's gone. Bomb or Spell
name: Critical Hit Deck #50
